name: BLOCK BUST - Spin, Shrink, Move, and Bounce to the Goal
name_original: BLOCK BUST - Spin, Shrink, Move, and Bounce to the Goal
description:
BLOCK BUST

The AWESOME Sequel to BLOCK'D!

Simply Touch the Blocks to maneuver the Ball to the Goal!

THERE ARE DIFFERENT TYPES OF BLOCKS!

- BROWN - Tap to Shrink!
- BLUE - Tap to Spin!
- Green - Hit to Bounce!
- Red - Tap to Move Up!
- Yellow - Tap to Move Left!


FEATURES:

- Get the Ball to the Goal!
- Perfect for Kids!
- Very fun Family Puzzle game!
- Tap to Shrink and Move the Blocks!
- Seventy Five Levels! 75 Levels!
- Three Separate Worlds!
- Hours of Clever FUN!
- Find the Hidden Star in each World!
- Game-center Achievements to Unlock!

THREE WORLDS!

UNDERWATER WORLD!
DESERT WORLD!
ANCIENT WORLD!


Try our other games! Look up Aeralas!
